text: @RyanAFournier On 24Jan20, China claimed to have first person-to-person transmission of disease. HOWEVER, on 19Jan20, a man IN THE UNITED STATES presented at the hospital with coronavirus. Trump "closed travel" to China 31Jan20. And said the virus was less serious than the flu, would just...
